RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT BRANCH_CODE, BRANCH_NAME FROM OLTMS_BRANCH WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' UNION SELECT 'ALL', 'ALL BRANCHES' FROM DUAL ORDER BY 1
SELECT PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT WHERE MODULE=? AND RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' ORDER BY PRODUCT_CODE

SELECT COMPONENT, COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION FROM LFTMS_PRODUCT_ICCF A, OLTMS_PRODUCT B WHERE A.PRODUCT = ? AND A.PRODUCT = B.PRODUCT_CODE AND NVL(A.STOP_APPLICATION,'N') = 'N' AND A.COMPONENT NOT IN (SELECT COMPONENT FROM LFTM_PRODUCT_ICCF WHERE NVL(A.UNFUND_COMPONENT, 'N') = 'Y' AND PRODUCT = ?) AND B.AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND B.RECORD_STAT = 'O' ORDER BY COMPONENT

RAD_DATASOURCES.RELATION_WITH_PARENT: LFTMS_PROD_COMP_MASTER.PRODUCT = LFTMS_PRODUCT_CURRENCY_LIMITS.PRODUCT AND LFTMS_PROD_COMP_MASTER.COMPONENT = LFTMS_PRODUCT_CURRENCY_LIMITS.COMPONENT AND LFTMS_PROD_COMP_MASTER.BRANCH_CODE = LFTMS_PRODUCT_CURRENCY_LIMITS.BRANCH_CODE

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT a.CCY_CODE, a.CCY_NAME, NVL(B.RATE_FIXING_DAYS, 0) RATE_FIXING_DAYS FROM CYTMS_CCY_DEFN A FULL OUTER JOIN OLTMS_CCY_RATE_FIXING_DAYS B ON A.CCY_CODE = B.CCY UNION SELECT '*.*', 'ALL CURRENCY CODES', 0 FROM DUAL
SELECT MODULE_ID, MODULE_DESC FROM SMTB_MODULES WHERE MODULE_ID IN ('OL','LB','LP','FC','TL')

SELECT DISTINCT RATE_CODE, RATE_DESCR FROM CFTMS_RATE_CODE WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' UNION SELECT DISTINCT A.RATE_CODE,A.RATE_DESCR FROM CFTMS_RFR_MASTER A WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND TYPE = NVL(?,TYPE)
